GULF OF GUINEA.
COTE D`IVOIRE.
1. F/V GLOBAL EIGHT, WHITE HULL, UNREPORTED.
   LAST KNOWN POSITION 04-51.35N 006-02.09W.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP
   A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO MRCC MONROVIA,
   IMARSAT-C: 460173111, 460199019,
   PHONE: 77 222 2715, 77 222 2716.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 987/12(38), PERSONS RESCUED.
